articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Bird flu jumps from birds to human in Louisiana; patient hospitalized - Ars Technica
articles.description: This is the first human case of bird flu in Louisiana.

articles.author: Zack Whittaker
articles.title: UnitedHealth's Optum left an AI chatbot, used by employees to ask questions about claims, exposed to the internet - TechCrunch
articles.description: Optum's AI chatbot was found exposed online at a time when the healthcare giant faces scrutiny for its use of AI to allegedly deny patient claims.
articles.content: Healthcare giant Optum has restricted access to an internal AI chatbot used by employees after a security researcher found it was publicly accessible online, and anyone could access it using only a w… [+5077 chars]
